# nginx从入门到精通pdf下载（TTLSA出品）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/nginx-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-pdf-xiazai-ttlsa-chupin
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/nginx-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-pdf-xiazai-ttlsa-chupin
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install nginx-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-pdf-xiazai-ttlsa-chupin
nginx-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-pdf-xiazai-ttlsa-chupin <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g nginx-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-pdf-xiazai-ttlsa-chupin
nginx-cong-rumen-dao-jingtong-pdf-xiazai-ttlsa-chupin <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
